recipesJson.name: Bizzaro Custard
recipesJson.author: Freshepies
recipesJson.description:
Crossing Strawberry Streams yields a wonderfully rich Sweet strawberry custard with a hint of tartness from the sweet currant.

Sweeten to taste.

reviews.text: as a shake and vape it’s very good but def needs to steep: Update : after a day steep this is by far the best custard i’ve had ina while
